predicates.description: This TAG will insure you that these Event Attributes will be blocked on the Thales DIS Proxy (More to come). Distribution: All communities
predicates.expanded: Use it when you want to block Event Attributes on the Thales DIS Proxy.

predicates.description: This TAG will insure you to share ONLY to the Thales Group MinArm alliance. Distribution: All communities
predicates.expanded: Use it when you want to share to the Thales Group MinArm alliance ONLY.

predicates.description: This TAG will insure you to share ONLY to the Thales Group ACN alliance. Distribution: All communities
predicates.expanded: Use it when you want to share to the Thales Group ACN alliance ONLY.

predicates.description: This TAG will insure you to share ONLY to the Thales Group InterCERT-FR alliance. Distribution: All communities
predicates.expanded: Use it when you want to share to the Thales Group InterCERT-FR alliance ONLY.
Use it when you want to assign a trust category to an Attribute or Globally to an Event.
(TLP:BLACK) Information cannot be effectively acted outside of strict and reduced circle of a trust.
Use it when this came from Watcher Platform.

entry.description: This TAG will insure you that this Event will be kept on your side. This Event will NOT be shared to the Thales Group community. Distribution: Your organisation only
entry.expanded: Use it when you want to keep the Event on your Organization ONLY.

entry.description: This TAG will insure you to share ONLY to the Thales Group Community. Distribution: All communities
entry.expanded: Use it when you want to share to the Thales Group Community ONLY.

entry.description: This TAG will insure you to share to the Thales Group External Alliances. Distribution: All communities
entry.expanded: Use it when you want to share to the Thales Group External Alliances (MinArm, ACN, InterCERT-FR).

entry.description: This TAG will insure you to share to the Thales Group Customers. Distribution: All communities
entry.expanded: Use it when you want to share to the Thales Group Customers.

description: Thales Group Taxonomy - was designed with the aim of enabling desired sharing and preventing unwanted sharing between Thales Group security communities.
